title: "Cyborg Lines"
content:
# Cyborg Lines

Welcome to Cyborg Lines, a website dedicated to showcasing minimalist art featuring single line drawings of cyborgs. Our striking wallpapers feature bold and vibrant colors that will make your desktop or mobile device stand out from the crowd.

Our collection of wallpapers is carefully curated to showcase the beauty of simplicity in design. Each wallpaper features a unique single line drawing of a cyborg, with no unnecessary details or distractions. We believe that less is more, and our wallpapers embody this philosophy perfectly.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction, technology, or just appreciate minimalist art, our wallpapers are sure to impress. So why settle for a boring wallpaper when you can have a stunning piece of art on your screen? Browse our collection today and find the perfect cyborg line wallpaper for your device.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
